name: Roll (Binary Moon)
description:
Roll is a physics based game that I made many moons ago for a competition on JayIsGames (anyone remember that?).

The goal of the game is to pop all of the red bubbles using the variety of obstacles in the level.

Note: don't press the high score button! The game is using a game high-score service that was shut down and so no longer works. If I can find the source code I might remove the button. That's a big if though :)

Like Legend of Dad I made this quite quickly - over a weekend if I remember correctly, so there's probably some bugs.

Follow me on Twitter
